document_title: Bronchiectasis: Causes, symptoms, treatment and prevention
subsection_content:
According to Prof. Dr. Ngo Quy Chau, bronchiectasis is irreversible damage. However, treatment will help reduce symptoms and progression of the disease, prevent the vicious cycle of repeated infections, and improve the patient's quality of life. (3)
1. Drainage of bronchial sputum
Instruct the patient how to cough and expectorate phlegm and chest vibration combined with postural drainage.
2. Treatment with antibiotics
Antibiotics are used in acute exacerbation of bronchiectasis with superinfection.
3. Treat symptoms
Bronchodilators are indicated for treatment when there is wheezing or snoring in the lungs; Give oxygen during an acute attack when there is hypoxemia.
4. Treatment of coughing up blood
Depending on the severity of hemoptysis, mild, moderate, severe, and very severe, the doctor will prescribe different treatments.
5. Surgical treatment
Removal of a lobe or one side of the lung in case of severe or persistent hemoptysis, blockage due to tumor...
Patients need to comply with the treatment regimen and follow-up appointments as scheduled
